LayoutNode.Content: Please remember that rejection of a paper is never a pleasant experience, especially to young researchers who could easily get discouraged by inconsiderate and offensive remarks. Even if the paper is not acceptable for publication, it still shows that the authors spent considerable effort in carrying out their research and writing their results down. Doing research is a noble activity. Therefore please avoid any possibly offensive remarks, and instead explain in plain terms why the paper does not meet the standards of TOCL.

LayoutNode.Content: The preferred format for an anonymous referee's report is a plain ASCII email message to the appropriate area editor. The ACM has professional copy editors, so please do not worry about correct spelling, grammar, and punctuation. A paper should not be rejected merely because of bad English.
